description: This file defines ESLint configuration for a Vue.js project using TypeScript and Vitest. It imports various plugins and configurations, and applies them to specific file patterns, as well as specifying files to ignore. The file exports a default configuration object created with 'defineConfigWithVueTs'.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: A function that defines ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support, accepting multiple configuration objects.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs.recommended
methods.description: Preset configuration for recommended Vue + TypeScript ESLint rules.
